text:
Здравейте,

 

Приложено изпращам банково извлечение от Еуробанк Гърция с текущ баланс в сметката в размер на 82 Евро.

 

Предвид, че месечната такса за клиъринг е 100 евро, моля сметката да се зареди с 300 Евро за следващите месеци.

 

Поздрави,

Елена Ковачки

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Friday, June 7, 2024 10:04 AM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Cc: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>
Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 04/2024

 

 

Dear Elena,

 

Please find attached the requested statements for May and June 2024.

 

With Kind regards,

Georgia

 

Georgia Loukopoulou

Transaction Banking

 



 

EUROBANK S.A.

GR 105 59, Athens, Greece 

t. +30 214 40 58 978 (58978)

e-mail: gloukopoulou@eurobank.gr <mailto:gloukopoulou@eurobank.gr>

I would kindly like to ask you to provide bank statements in English, regarding our bank account for May and June 2024.

 

Kindly Regards,

Elena Kovachki

Administration & Back office Manager

Natural Gas Trading Department

From: Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr <mailto:GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr> > 
Sent: Monday, May 13, 2024 2:21 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr <mailto:anpalamidas@eurobank.gr> >; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:GCM@eurobank.gr> >; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr <mailto:SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr> >
Subject: FW: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 04/2024

 

Dear Mrs Kovachki,

 

Please find attached the requested statements for May as of today and for April.

Of course we can send you monthly the bank statement of your account, starting from today, nothing else needed from you (i.e PoA) 

 

Furthermore we attached the last communication we had regarding  the access to e-banking and please for your response.

If there is any other issue outstanding will be more than happy to help you.

 

With best regards,

Georgia

 

Georgia Loukopoulou

Sales & Relationship Management 

Securities Services 

Transaction Banking

 



 

EUROBANK S.A. 

2-6, Pesmazoglou Str.

GR 105 59, Athens, Greece 

t. +30 214 40 58 978 (58978)

e-mail: gloukopoulou@eurobank.gr <mailto:gloukopoulou@eurobank.gr> 

 

   

 

 

From: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Monday, May 13, 2024 11:22 AM
To: Kazara Aikaterini <akazara@eurobank.gr <mailto:akazara@eurobank.gr> >; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >

Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 04/2024

 

	CAUTION: This is an EXTERNAL Email. Please DO NOT open attachments, click links or reply, unless you have verified the sender and know the content is safe. 

	ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ: Το Email προέρχεται από ΕΞΩΤΕΡΙΚΗ ΠΗΓΗ. Παρακαλούμε ΜΗΝ απαντήσετε, MHN ανοίξετε attachments & MHN ακολουθήσετε links, πριν βεβαιωθείτε οτι ο αποστολέας και το περιεχόμενο είναι ασφαλή. 

 

Dear Eurobank Team,

 

On behalf of Tibiel L.t.d., I would kindly like to ask you again to provide information regarding our bank account in Greece for the last month.

 

We need the bank statement where the accountants must see the bank charges withdrawn and the balance to date.

 

Could you please check … can we make a passive access / statements & invoices/ with PoA?

 

We are trying to resolve this issue since November 2023.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

 

 

Kindly Regards,

Elena Kovachki

Administration & Back office Manager

Natural Gas Trading Department

Mob: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.

Subject: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 04/2024

 

Dear all,

 

Attached you will find the invoice issued by Eurobank SA regarding:

 

The fees for the maintenance of Sub-Accounts at the Natural Gas Platform in April 2024.

 

We are at your disposal for any further clarification.

 

 

Kind regards,

 

Aikaterini Kazara

SENIOR SECURITIES & FUNDS ADMINISTRATOR 

General Member Clearing Services 

Group Investment Products Operations 

 



 

EUROBANK S.A.

Panagouli & Siniosoglou Str. (Building E)

GR 142 34 Nea Ionia, Athens Greece

Tel

Email  

 

: (+30) 21 4406 3242  

: GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:gcm@eurobank.gr>
